name: Generic Form
creator: admin

description.en-gb: This screen is generic and allows users define fields

parameterTemplate:
{
    /*
     * The acceptButtonLabel attribute is the label of the accept or send button
     */
    "acceptButtonLabel": "Accept",

    /*
     * The canceltButtonLabel attribute is the label of the clear button. If
     * this attribute is not used, no reset button will be shown.
     */
    "cancelButtonLabel": "Clear",

    /*
     * The fields attribute is a list of fields of the form, each of them
     * containing the following attributes:
     *     - name(required):  identifier of the field that will be used as a key
     *                        in the output data.
     *     - type(optional):  type of the field in text | password | checkbox |
     *                        textbox. By default: text.
     *     - label(optional): the label to show for this input entry. If this
     *                        attribute is not defined, the name attribute will
     *                        be use.
     *     - value(optional): the initial value for this field. If this
     *                        attribute is not defined, the field will be empty
     *                        at the beginning.
     *     - required(optional): a boolean value indicating whether this field
     *                        is required or not.
     *
     * If this attribute is not defined, the following fields will be used.
     */
    "fields": [
        {
            "name":     "input",
            "value":    "value"
        }/*,
        {
            // Other field
            "name":     "pass",
            "type":     "password",
            "label":    "Password",
            "value":    "",
            "required": true
        },

        ... more fields ...
        
        */
    ]
}
